Reviews.Title: Died completely after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I dunno, maybe it's a stroke of bad luck but my phone completely died on me after 4 months. I bought a battery and tried to see if that worked, but it still wouldn't turn on. Be careful about buying unlocked phones online, you don't know if the phone is good quality. It sucks cause this phone was one of the best phones i ever bought.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied:
Reviews.Author: Yanett García
Reviews.Content: The phone responds to the features listed, responds quickly to commands, the image is sharp, I can see my image take pictures without anyone else, with its two cameras. It adapts to the needs of telephone companies of my country without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Maria Valero
Reviews.Content: It is phone has everything and nice resolution but low internal memory and this bring problems because It presents dificulty at the time to download the applications, but everything else is excellent and comfortable design, and brought the charged adapter europeo/american incluided

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Ananth
Reviews.Content: Great phone. very smooth operation, touch controls are smooth..... simple and handy (not big).... it is unlocked and works fine for me

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Yassaiv Rojas
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, lo recomiendo pues igual estoy esperándolo aun no lo recibo, por el trafico internacional, gracias por la pregunta
